name: Grand Prix 3
description:
Grand Prix 3 is a simulation, sports and racing game developed by MicroProse Software and Geoff Crammond. It came out on 24-08-2000. Hasbro Interactive published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Grand Prix 3 has a score of 87. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Grand Prix 3 is available on PC.
